schema.title: Decrease Token Allowance
schema.description: Lowers the spender's access of tokens from the owner's account by amount.

amount.title: Amount to Tokens
amount.description: The amount to decrease the allowance by.

recipient.title: Spender
recipient.description: The address to have their allowance decreased.

expiration-label.title: Expiration Type
expiration-label.description: Optional expiration for the allowance of the spender.

expiration-warning.description: The amount specified in DecreaseAllowance does not replace the old amount but is subtracted from it. If the result is 0 or less, then the spender no longer has an Allowance from the owner. If an Expiration is set, it will overwrite previously set Expiration !If expires is Some(), overwrites current allowance expiration with this one.!

Expiration.description: Expiration represents a point in time when some event happens. It can compare with a BlockInfo and will return is_expired() == true once the condition is hit (and for every block in the future)

at_time.title: At Time
at_time.description: The time to expire when env.block.time. (As uint64)
